toggl-apikey-help: You can find your API token in your profile settings in Toggl.
toggl-response-error: Error when trying to query Toggl (HTTP Status: $1 / $2)
toggl-error-workspace-id: The workspace ID must be set either as parameter workspace_id in the parser function or globally with the wgTogglWorkspaceID configuration setting.
toggl-error-curl-missing: curl PHP extension needs to be installed
